name: Tech Innovations Technologies Pvt Ltd
description:
Established in 2012, Tech innovations Technologies (Ti technologies) which is now a part of RCG Global services is an end-end IT services company having offices in Kochi, India and U.S.A. we are offering services in eCommerce development, Web App Development as well as Mobile App Development to uplift and create your online solutions as per the business Goals. 
Ti Technologies offers a wide range of services like consulting, solution architecting, offshore development, eCommerce development using Magento, Shopify, Shopware etc, and web/ mobile application development using latest cutting-edge technologies.
We work in partnership with our clients to establish the best technical and visual solutions for their needs. With expertise in well-crafted design, skilled developers and our project management expertise provide a comprehensive solution to our customers combining our solid experience across each vertical.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Unit III A, Carnival Infopark Phase4, Infopark
